https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jw66TeSN9cD0Y0nBTJWyKNDErIW.jpg It's Christmas Eve and Tori just wants to get drunk and party, but when a robotic Santa Clause at a nearby toy store goes haywire and begins a rampant killing spree through her small town, she's forced into a battle for survival. Christmas Bloody Christmas
